summary: A command‑line utility that runs the full consistency‑training pipeline for generative models, loading a dataset, building the model, configuring optimizers, schedulers, loss weighting, EMA, checkpointing and optional validation/logging, supporting both unconditional and class‑conditional setups.
business_intent: Enable researchers and developers to efficiently train state‑of‑the‑art consistency models from scratch for image generation tasks, facilitating experimentation, model evaluation, and downstream product integration.
